edu.lafayette.bci.devices

Interface EmotivObserver

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DroneControlPanel

    public interface EmotivObserver
    An interface for observers of the Emotiv sensor, quality, and battery data. All methods except qualityChanged require the implementing class to pull the data from the Emotiv headset. All methods are asynchronous and may be called from a thread other than the main thread.
    Author:
    Haley Garrison

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void batteryChanged(Emotiv e)
      Called when the battery value is updated.
      void gyrosChanged(Emotiv e)
      Called when the gyroscope data has changed.
      void qualityChanged(Emotiv e, java.lang.String sensor, int quality)
      Called when the quality value of a sensor has changed.
      void sensorsChanged(Emotiv e)
      Called when the value of the sensors has changed.
